mapper.select: select cus.username as cusName, cus.mobile as cusMobile, solu.quote_num, solu.add_time, solu.solu_desc as descr, design.mobile as designMobile, design.username as designName from t_customer cus, t_solutions solu, t_user design, t_house house where cus.design_id=design.id and cus.id = house.customer_id and house.house_id=solu.house_id and design.id=solu.designer_id and solu.solu_id=#{soluId}
